entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers or a few flurries this evening and after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
